Tmisc

Aliases

Source: R/aliases.R

Aliases more pleasing to use in a dplyr pipeline:

brackets `[[`

dollar 		`$`

is_in 		`%in%`

and 		`&`

or 		`|`

equals 		`==`

is_gt 		`>`

is_geq 		`>=`

is_lt 		`<`

is_leq 		`<=`

not 		`!`

set_colnames 		`colnames<-`

set_rownames 		`rownames<-`

set_attributes 		`attributes<-`

set_attr 		`attr<-`

Contents

Developed by Stephen Turner.
